scripts.prebuild: bun run build-storybook && bun run copy-storybook
scripts.copy-storybook: if [ "$COPY_TO_DIST" = "true" ]; then rm -rf dist/storybook && mkdir -p dist/storybook && cp -r storybook-static/* dist/storybook/; else rm -rf public/storybook && mkdir -p public/storybook && cp -r storybook-static/* public/storybook/; fi
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Postbuild script started' && echo 'BUILD_STORYBOOK=$BUILD_STORYBOOK' && echo 'COPY_TO_DIST=$COPY_TO_DIST' && if [ "$BUILD_STORYBOOK" = "true" ]; then echo 'Copying storybook...' && bun run copy-storybook; fi && if [ "$COPY_TO_DIST" = "true" ] && [ -d ".output/public" ]; then echo 'Copying to dist...' && mkdir -p dist && cp -r .output/public/* dist/ && echo 'Dist folder contents:' && ls -la dist/; elif [ "$COPY_TO_DIST" = "true" ]; then echo 'Warning: .output/public not found, skipping dist copy'; fi && echo 'Postbuild script finished'
